# amount

**Instance Property**

The precise amount of money to pay.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var amount: INCurrencyAmount? { get }
```

## Discussion

Upon receiving an intent, this property contains the monetary value (if any) specified by the user. If the amount is missing or `0`, use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPaymentAmount/amountType] property to infer the amount to pay. When reporting amounts back to Siri using this class, always specify a value for this property.

## Getting the Payment Amount

- **amountType**: The account-specific amount to pay.
- **INAmountType**: Constants indicating an account-specific amount to apply to a payment.
